title: Mary "Missy" Cummings - Prof.,  Autonomy Lab and Duke Robotics
description:
Who better to talk to about autonomous cars than a professor of the subject? Missy Cummings is currently a Professor in the Duke University Pratt School of Engineering, the Duke Institute of Brain Sciences, and is the director of the Humans and Autonomy Laboratory and Duke Robotics. Her research interests include human-unmanned vehicle interaction, human-autonomous system collaboration, human-systems engineering, public policy implications of unmanned vehicles, and the ethical and social impact of technology.

Read her paper here: https://hal.pratt.duke.edu/sites/hal.pratt.duke.edu/files/u39/2020-min.pdf

https://pratt.duke.edu/faculty/missy-cummings

 

*There's an edit in the middle of the show because her connection froze for a few minutes.
